Package units

Class CrewMember

  • java.lang.Object
    • units.CrewMember
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Human, Martian, Medic, Nebula, StarLord, Transformer
    public class CrewMember
extends java.lang.Object
    The super class dedicated to the different CrewMember types.
    Author:
    sga113

      • pilotShip

        public void pilotShip​(Planet source,
                      Planet destination,
                      CrewMember member,
                      RandomEvents random)
        changes the position of the crew from the source to the destination
        Parameters:
        source - the current planet position of the crew.
        destination - the planet that the crew travels to, the planet position of the crew gets updated to destination.
        member - co-pilot of the main pilot of the ship
        random - RandomEvents object that calls random events like asteroid belt. Rocket Launch Sound - http://soundbible.com/1498-Rocket.html

      • sleep

        public void sleep()
        Sets the tiredness level back to zero if this method is called on a crew member.

      • usingMeds

        public void usingMeds​(Medicine oldMeds,
                      int quantity)
        If enough medicine on stock then this method enables the crew member to use medicines and improves the crew member's health status. It also makes sure that the health of the crew member does not go over 100(i.e the max health).
        Parameters:
        oldMeds - existing medicines in stock
        quantity - of the medicines being used.

      • repair

        public void repair​(SpaceShip ship)
        Repairs the Ship's shield and restores its health 100
        Parameters:
        ship -

      • setNumberOfActions

        public void setNumberOfActions​(int numberOfActions)
        method that reduces the number of actions of the crew member.
        Parameters:
        numberOfActions - reduces the number of actions by a specific amount.

      • resetNumberOfActions

        public void resetNumberOfActions()
        this method is called when the next day method is called. resets the number of action of the crew member to 2 at the start of each day.

      • isEqual

        public boolean isEqual​(CrewMember member)

        Returns:

      • searchPlanet

        public boolean searchPlanet​(Planet planet)
        searches the planet for food, medicine, money, space ship parts.
        Parameters:
        planet - is the planet being searched.
        Returns:
        true if spaceship is found, false when anything else is found or not found.
